item.title: Interview with Amy Heineike - Director of Mathematics at Quid
item.description: Amy Heineike <div> <strong><img src="http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m1588osxOV1r08wvg.jpg" /></strong> </div> <div> <strong><br /></strong>Amy Heineike is the Director of Mathematics at <a href="http://quid.com/" target="_blank">Quid</a>, a startup that seeks to understand technology development and dissemination through data analysis. She was the first employee at Quid, where she helped develop their technology early on. She has been recognized as one of the <a href="http://thephenomlist.com/lists/8/people/32" target="_blank">top Big Data Scientists</a>. As a part of our ongoing <a href="http://simplystatistics.
